subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The Czech Republic took a 2-0 lead over Italy after the Wimbledon champion Petra Kvitova and Lucie Safarova won the opening singles matches of their best-of-five Fed Cup semifinal.
snippet: The Czech Republic took a 2-0 lead over Italy after the Wimbledon champion Petra Kvitova and Lucie Safarova won the opening singles matches of their best-of-five Fed Cup semifinal.
